name: Hvacpi
tagline: HVACpi is an open source project that supports the use of the Raspberry Pi board computer to run HVAC systems.
body:
The primary goal of the HVACpi project is to create a low cost web enabled home heating and cooling management system which consists of highly available technology.  HVACpi will use the raspberry pi, RPi GPIO, raspbian linux, lamp, and python.

To learn more about the Raspberry Pi [Click Here](http://www.raspberrypi.org/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
